title.label: Needs update - locking up on first game

content.label: Current version (as of 11/27/2020) locks up and won’t open first game

The PCH app has always had some occasional freezing issues, but I’ve been willing to overlook them in the past. However, following the most recent update (2.4.460 as of this review), the app is barely functional. Upon launch, the game loads fine, welcome tokens are received, and the user gets moved to the first game. But as soon as the user attempts to launch the first game, the app freezes. Closing the game and relaunching doesn’t seem to fix the freezing issue as it did in the past. I DON’T SEE THIS GAME BEING FUNCTIONAL UNTIL ANOTHER RELEASE IS PUBLISHED, addressing this specific issue.

I have been using the PCH app for a very long time and have enjoyed it. However, in the last 2 months I am no longer able to open the app without it freezing.  I try to tap the levels and nothing. I’ve deleted the app and reinstalled it numerous times. Feeling frustrated because it used to work so easily. :(
How can I ever win publishers clearing House. It keeps freezing can not play game.

title.label: I’ve been ordering since 1986 and still haven’t won

content.label:
I’ve been ordering magazines and other items since 1986. I’ve been entering the sweepstakes through publishers clearing House.
If I just one of those prices it would be enough to keep me from becoming homeless with a small child.
ADS ADS ADS ADS ADS  that’s all there is honestly and it’s it’s literally impossible to win the game see you should have won and then they just fake out inscutually hate the app now

My sister has been using the app and everything for the past little while now and convinced me to enter and make an account today. I downloaded the app and everything but when my sister opens her app on her phone it changed to saying “welcome Brianna” which is my name. Her name is Brittany. Her email is still attached to her app on her phone though, it’s just using my name now. We live in the same house but have different email accounts. Different first names but our last names are still the same, too. Can only one person per household enter? I’m confused. Help!

The only issue i have with this app is that whenever load into a new area the coin animation is stuck and i have to force close the app and start all over or sometimes the ads get stuck and i can not redeem my coins and entries

I love PCH and I enter the sweepstakes every day on their website. This app, however, is far from a pleasant experience. It constantly tells me that the servers are down for maintenance and randomly signs me out. When I try to sign back in, it tells me that there was an error connecting to the server. This is really frustrating. Please fix this!!

EDIT 11/21/2020: Now you’re saying there’s a basketball game included? Where is it? I’ve been playing all the games every day and have yet to come across this new one.
Also, please stop telling me how to play the skee ball, balloon dart, and bowling games over and over again. I know how to play them all!!

Whatever you did to this app I can’t keep it loaded it keeps freezing. It’s just not working right. It was working good till you upgraded The app. I love the game but really tired of having to get out of it and go back in, and that don’t help sometimes. Please fix it ....

This app takes my iPhone 11 to hot zone, meaning it makes my phone soooo hot that I have a turn it off and only play the app for minutes at a time.  My android phone doesn’t get hot at all, just the iOS. I wish you all could identify the problem and fix it soon.

Might be more entertaining if the app was not so buggy.  Extremely slow most of the time, closes often and difficulty logging in.   The instructions added to the games are also annoying and NOT necessary.
App Keeps Freezing. What are you going to do to fix it?
The app won’t even load unless I let it stay on the frozen screen for like 15 minutes and that’s with each game
Slow to respond and update says there is a basketball game added I don’t see one.
The app is frozen and I’ve te downloaded it several times

Just another bad PCH scheme to get rich off of you downloading their game and watching more of their ads. You won’t win anything. You feel like you’re so lucky getting all those useless tokens to play useless drawings, because in the end, those items don’t exist, and the ones that do exist go to PCH staff and their families, not you. There’s better ways to waste your time, especially to better music than found in this app. PCH always has been a scam. Just look up PCH Ed McMahon scam and you will find that they have been lying to and scheming against people for years, and nothing ever changes. My grandma faithfully purchased stuff from these awful people for years, hoping to hear a knock on her door that would change her kids and grandkids’ future, but in the end, it’s just more PCH crap. Stay away.
The app crashes about 15 seconds after it loads.
This app is very frustrating because it causes your phone to freeze up several times a day.

When the app is running, my iPhone 11 Pro runs hot enough to be too hot to even hold. Makes me wonder what they’re doing in the background to need so many constant CPU cycles. Never had an app do this before. Phone cools off immediately upon closing the app. Super sketchy.
I would like to use this app but it crashes just a min after opening it.
Won’t load after latest update
Wasted my money downloading, I don’t have streaming internet like others.
I can’t do anything really because as soon as I open the app it freezes so I can’t do anything so not sure what to really think about this app.
This game frequently gives me “0” points even thought I should have gotten 25000 points. It frequently freezes and gives me error messages and then I have to restart the game on my iPhone XR.
Needs work won’t play 1/2 the time
There are many server errors. Frustrating. Good game. Hopefully it gets fixed.
The PCH app freezes up so you do not get to always enter tokens for drawings..... bad bad bad

I like the app if it would work all the time. It freezes up, constant server down and can’t connect with server notices, not getting token credits. Constantly kicks me out where I have to log back in. It’s really feisty that it’ll take 3 hours to get through the whole thing. PLEASE FIX.
The app crashes EVERY time I open it. It loads, I click one thing, and then crash!! No good.
I think it is a really fun app...when it is working. I have to restart it once or twice a day. That takes away the fun and destroys my token goals for the day. Please upgrade!

I am greatly disappointed in the new pch app. It will not open for more than a few seconds on my iPhone 6s. All I can get it to do is the initial welcome screen and the car drives to the first point of entry. After clicking on the point of entry the screen locks and the app shuts down. I have tried cleaning memory and even uninstalled/reinstalled the app several times but still no luck.

title.label: My app shuts down when I tap on the first game with the gold envelope.

content.label: Can’t start  it shuts down every time. I’ve deleted it and installed it a few times still shuts down
I would rate game 60 to 65/100. Too much down time with servers and ? Cannot spend the time game requires to get at times.
Last couple days it takes forever to play the game.  Please fix. Been 3 days and still don’t work.  Is anyone running this game?!!!!!!!!!!

I love this app! 
However the new update? Perhaps has even more bugs to fix.
The new app and website needs fixing,
Both app and website keep freezing consistently and have a difficult time finishing an entry and freezes during the process causing the player to start again and the same thing happening. Just turns out to be so sad for us. Lol but really.. it is
The new 2020 iphone SE with the most GB’s cannot handle this version of the app. Different. Please update it and work hard to fix it because we love you all. Love your app... and want to play🙂😊🙃
It keeps kicking me out of the app every time I try to do anything. Tried reloading the app and still does it. Waste of time

I sit and play this every day it’s a fun app but when you reach a certain level is shut you down  for maintenance every single time and you can  clearly see you there is more stage as you can go but it always shut down in the same spot every time I play it and it shuts down for maintenance.But it’s a good game if you just wanna waste time and search the web.

Are you ever going to fix this app so we can move the van more than 3 times without the game crashing and the box that’s says “Servers are down for maintenance” but you reload game and amazing the servers are up, till you move the van 3 more times?

title.label: How can you win if you can’t play???

content.label: Game keeps kicking me off. Logging me out at a whim?? Have to sign back on. No maintenance whatsoever on this app. I’ve updated, used WiFi, without WiFi.. backed up my device. What more can be done 😡

The game is fun and the changes in the games make it more interesting but I don’t need instructions each time a game opens.  The most frustrating though is how many times it crashes, I have to close it out and reopen it...sometimes on all the envelopes.
As much as is fun to play this game it’s also very annoying when you try to load the app. It’s not connecting or just shuts down every time.
May the blessings that are reigned on us be enough love to continue the prosperous moves
I have been playing pch for year I’m even at VIP level and still nothing

So I was prompted to download the new PCH app this morning. Rather than the cornhole or fountain toss, now there are a roving array of 5 or so different games divided by the 50,000 token treasure chests. The issue is this: all new graphics that go on and on and take much more time than they need to. Like someone at PCH is more impressed with their graphics than the user experience. Not for me.
Can’t play on any of my iPhones. Constantly crashes during each play so almost impossible to advance and get entries. Total bs.
Uninstalled and reinstalled the PCH app several times with no results with the freezing up after tapping the first coin. Already contacted support, but none of the suggestions worked.
I’ve loaded this app on more than one device. I have been unable to fully open the first “envelope.”  Several of these attempts were after rebooting my devices (25-30 attempts).
Used to work, now doesn’t after multiple uninstall and install, clear data and etc.

The games would be fun if you didn’t have to wait through all of the excessively long, tedious, repetitive ads, many of which are from unscrupulous advertisers and scammers. PCH obviously has no ethics.
